BriefDescription: Cycles stalled due to CRU or BRU operations
Cycles stalled due to ISU Branch Operations
Cycles in which a Group Completed
Cycles stalled by CO queue full
Cycles stalled due to CRU Operations
Cycles stalled by flushes
Cycles stalled by FXU Multi-Cycle Instructions
Cycles stalled by FXU
Other cycles stalled by FXU
Cycles GCT empty due to Branch Mispredicts
Cycles GCT empty due to Branch Mispredicts and Icache Misses
GCT empty cycles
Cycles GCT empty where dispatch was held
Cycles GCT empty where dispatch was held due to issue queue
Cycles GCT empty where dispatch was held due to maps
Cycles GCT empty where dispatch was held due to syncs and other effects
Cycles GCT empty where dispatch was held due to SRQ
Cycles stalled by GCT empty due to Icache misses
Cycles stalled by GCT empty due to Icache misses that resolve in the local L2 or L3
Cycles stalled by GCT empty due to Icache misses that resolve off-chip
Other GCT empty cycles
MetricExpr: (PM_GCT_NOSLOT_CYC / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_GCT_NOSLOT_IC_MISS  / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_GCT_NOSLOT_BR_MPRED / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_GCT_NOSLOT_BR_MPRED_ICMISS / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - ((PM_GCT_NOSLOT_DISP_HELD_MAP / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) + (PM_GCT_NOSLOT_DISP_HELD_SRQ / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) + (PM_GCT_NOSLOT_DISP_HELD_ISSQ / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) + (PM_GCT_NOSLOT_DISP_HELD_OTHER / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL))

BriefDescription: Cycles stalled by heavyweight syncs
Cycles stalled by LSU
Cycles stalled by D-Cache Misses
Cycles stalled by D-Cache Misses that resolved in distant interventions and memory
Cycles stalled by D-Cache Misses that resolved in remote or distant caches
Cycles stalled by D-Cache Misses that resolved in the local L2 or L3, where there was a conflict
Cycles stalled by D-Cache Misses that resolved in the local L2 or L3
Cycles stalled by D-Cache Misses that resolved in the local L2 or L3, where there was no conflict
Cycles stalled by D-Cache Misses that resolved in other core's caches or memory
Cycles stalled by D-Cache Misses that resolved in local memory or local L4
Cycles stalled by D-Cache Misses that resolved in remote interventions and memory
Cycles stalled by ERAT Translation rejects
Cycles stalled by LSU load finishes
Cycles stalled by LHS rejects
Cycles stalled by LMQ Full rejects
Cycles stalled by Other LSU Operations
MetricExpr: (PM_CMPLU_STALL_LSU / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_CMPLU_STALL_DCACHE_MISS / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_CMPLU_STALL_REJECT / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_CMPLU_STALL_STORE / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_CMPLU_STALL_LOAD_FINISH / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_CMPLU_STALL_ST_FWD / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL)

BriefDescription: Cycles stalled by LSU Rejects
Cycles stalled by Other LSU Rejects
Cycles stalled by LSU store forwarding
Cycles stalled by LSU Stores
Cycles stalled by lightweight syncs
Cycles stalled by nops (nothing next to finish)
Other thread block stall cycles
MetricExpr: (PM_CMPLU_STALL_THRD - PM_CMPLU_STALL_LWSYNC - PM_CMPLU_STALL_HWSYNC - PM_CMPLU_STALL_MEM_ECC_DELAY - PM_CMPLU_STALL_FLUSH - PM_CMPLU_STALL_COQ_FULL)  / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL

BriefDescription: Cycles unaccounted for
MetricExpr: (PM_RUN_CYC / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_CMPLU_STALL / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_GCT_NOSLOT_CYC / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_NTCG_ALL_FIN / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_CMPLU_STALL_THRD / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) -  (PM_GRP_CMPL / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL)

BriefDescription: Stall cycles unaccounted for
MetricExpr: (PM_CMPLU_STALL / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_CMPLU_STALL_BRU_CRU / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_CMPLU_STALL_FXU / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_CMPLU_STALL_VSU / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_CMPLU_STALL_LSU / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_CMPLU_STALL_NTCG_FLUSH / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL) - (PM_CMPLU_STALL_NO_NTF / PM_RUN_INST_CMPL)
